players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "I believe Charlie's investigation. We should vote for Bob to protect the town."
Bob: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. Don't be fooled by his lies."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob is lying. I am the detective and I have proof he is mafia. Your vote is critical to win this now."
Bob: "Alice, Charlie is lying. I investigated him and he's mafia. Trust me, I'm the real detective. Vote Charlie to save the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
